summary: An ordinance providing for the rebating and refunding of the excess portions of all assessments levied for the improvement of East Madison Street, under Ordinance No. 14985 creating Local Improvement District No. 1339 to the payors thereof, directing the City Treasurer to prepare a detailed list of said payors of assessments, authorizing the drawing of warrants and appropriating money out of said Local Improvement Fund for said purpose.
